So, you're alone in the classroom, nothing to do, and you'd have to look around. That's it. It seems kinda easy to me, but if you begin to have problems, just tell.

The game can be found here.

And, yeah, I'd appreciate some reviews.

Edit: P.S. I'm not that great with making and writing IF's, so please don't expect it to be great.

A command 'think about _____' has been added, too. You can think about a few stuff only, like an escape, or the door, etc.

And yes, the watch has a problem. When it reaches 8:00, it is 7:60, instead. I'm trying to fix this.
